entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
